div.h2: Late Starts and Emergency Closure Days

a.title: Late Starts and Emergency Closure Days

div.a: Late Starts and Emergency Closure Days

a.title: Late Starts and Emergency Closure Days
a.span: Late Starts and Emergency Closure Days

nav.div: Tahoma School District » Departments » Extended Enrichment » EEP Information » Late Starts and Emergency Closure Days

div.p: The Extended Enrichment program will remain open under a modified schedule as follows during Late Start and Emergency Closure Days.

Late Starts: EEP will open at 8:00AM at each Elementary school. Students will stay in EEP and go to school at the late start time. Breakfast will not be served. EEP will close at the normal time of 6:30PM.

School Closures: School Closures: EEP will open at 8:00 am at only one location - Shadow Lake Elementary at 22620 Sweeney Road SE, Maple Valley, WA 98038. Breakfast will be served. Please send a sack lunch, as school lunches will not be provided. EEP will close at the normal time of 6:30PM.

If at any time during a school wide late start or school closure day the Extended Enrichment staff and/or school administrators determine road conditions/weather/power situations are creating, or are anticipating creating an unsafe environment for our EEP students and staff, the program may be closed. Each parent will be notified and required to pick-up or have an emergency contact person pick-up their child.

Tahoma School District Emergency announcements will be made on the following media/web locations:
Radio: KIRO 97.3FM; KOMO 1000AM and 97.7FM; KVI 570AM
TV: KOMO Channel 4; KING Channel 5; KIRO Channel 7; KCPQ Channel 13

If there are any scheduling questions during a late start or emergency closure day , please contact your EEP Site Manager’s Cell Phone. The Tahoma District normally has scheduling decisions made by 6:00AM and this information is first transmitted to our Staff Members:

Cedar River Elementary: (206) 777-5511
Glacier Park Elementary: (206)200-6824
Lake Wilderness Elementary: (206)200-1282
Rock Creek Elementary: (206)200-2102
Shadow Lake Elementary: (206)200-1989
Tahoma Elementary: (425) 410-4628
